headline: Did Analyst Upgrades and Pipeline Optimism Just Shift Boston Scientific's (BSX) Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent days, Boston Scientific has drawn upbeat commentary from Wall Street, with analysts citing strong demand across electrophysiology and structural heart, ongoing trials such as its Global Pulsed Field Ablation program, and a track record of earnings beats ahead of its expected fourth-quarter 2025 results on February 4, 2026. Analysts’ upward earnings estimate revisions and a favorable research-house ranking have reinforced confidence that Boston Scientific’s product pipeline and...

headline: Is it the Right Time to Add STERIS Stock to Your Portfolio?

headline: 2 Growth Stocks to Add to Your Roster and 1 We Find Risky
summary: Growth is a hallmark of all great companies, but the laws of gravity eventually take hold. Those who rode the COVID boom and ensuing tech selloff in 2022 will surely remember that the market’s punishment can be swift and severe when trajectories fall.
